hero.title: Discover AI Agents for
hero.description: Browse community-created agents, share your own, and extend izan.io with powerful AI assistants. Submit via GitHub PR- anyone can contribute.

home.shareDescription: Built an awesome agent? Submit it to the marketplace via a GitHub pull request. Once merged, it's live for everyone.

agents.title: Browse Agents
agents.noResults: No agents found matching your search.
agents.notFoundDesc: This agent doesn't exist or hasn't been published yet.

submit.title: Submit an Agent
submit.description: Share your agent with the izan.io community.
submit.signInRequired: Sign in with GitHub to submit your agent to the marketplace.

steps.basicInfoDesc: Name, description and identity for your agent
steps.systemPromptDesc: Define your agent's personality and behavior
steps.mcpServersDesc: Connect external tools and data sources
steps.configDesc: Tags and example prompts for discoverability

fields.name: Name
fields.descriptionPlaceholder: A brief description of what your agent does...
fields.iconHint: Pick an emoji that represents your agent
fields.systemPromptTip: Tip: Be specific about your agent's role, expertise, and how it should respond.
fields.tagsHint: Add up to 5 tags to help users find your agent
fields.examplePromptsHint: Show users what your agent can do
fields.mcpServersHint: MCP servers this agent needs. They'll be auto-imported when users download this agent.
fields.noMCPsHint: MCP servers are optional. Add them if your agent needs external tools.
fields.macrosHint: Upload macro/automation JSON files exported from izan.io. These browser automation tools will be bundled with your agent.

success.title: Agent Submitted!
success.description: Your pull request has been created. Once reviewed and merged, your agent will be live on zihin.io.
